biography.summary: Pete Ricketts is a United States Senator from Nebraska, serving since 2023 after being appointed to fill the seat. A Republican, he previously served as Governor of Nebraska from 2015 to 2023. He has a background in business as a former CEO of TD Ameritrade.
biography.education: BA in economics from the University of Chicago.
biography.career: Before entering politics, Ricketts led TD Ameritrade as CEO and was involved in business and philanthropy.

contact.office_address: 139 Russell Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Sworn in as Governor of Nebraska.
Appointed to the United States Senate representing Nebraska.
